com.bitplan.jaxb

Class JaxbFactory<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bitplan.jaxb.JaxbFactory<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - - the type to be marshalled and unmarshalled
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.bitplan.jaxb.JaxbFactoryApi<T>

    public class JaxbFactory<T>
extends Object
implements com.bitplan.jaxb.JaxbFactoryApi<T>
    generic JaxbFactory using the Java Architecture for XML Binding JAXB to convert Java objects XML and JSON documents and back https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Java_Architecture_for_XML_Binding
    Author:
    wf
